categoryTree.description: This mind map groups together tricks in the same category and the connection to a base trick.

trickTree.description: The whole graph gets increasingly more difficult to the right. Each trick tree splits up into more difficult tricks and is connected by lines. We recommend learning an individual trick tree from left to right.

faq.naming_question: Where do the trick names comes from?
faq.naming_answer: Naming is done by us with community input.
faq.scoring_question: How are the difficulty scores assigned?
faq.scoring_answer: We try to score every trick as fair as possible. It is represented by the number skates.
faq.categories_answer: The categories group tricks together by their similarities.
faq.usage_answer: You can get detailed information about all tricks on the freestylepedia page, learn about the the different categories in the Mind Map or see which tricks build upon others in the Trick Tree.
faq.existence_answer: You can quickly look up tricks to show your friends or watch them on the ice to learn them.
faq.improve_question: How can I use Freestylepedia to improve on the ice?
faq.improve_answer: With Freestylepedia you can easily see which tricks are achievable for you and which tricks are similar to the tricks you already mastered

aboutUs.story: Two members of our groups had the idea of creating a place to look up tricks. We both quite often have different names for the same trick. So we hope this collection allows everybody to find the tricks under the name they know while also learning other aliases. We worked hard on this project for a long time and it took multiple attempts. Now we are proud to present it and hope you will enjoy this new resource in our sport.
aboutUs.MisgDescription: The Mainz Ice Skate Group is a small Ice Breaking group from Mainz in Germany. We love to skate at all ice rinks in the area.
aboutUs.BlackbirdDescription: The Blackbirds are a munich Ice Freestyle Group with eight members. They are mostly in the East Stadium Munich or the new Olympic Ice Stadium.

noResultsSuggestions: Try adjusting your search term or filters. Sometimes less specific terms or broader queries can help you find what you're looking for.
